clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For treatment experienced adult patients infected with only CCR5 tropic HIV 1 detectable who have evidence of viral replication and HIV 1 strains resistant to multiple antiretroviral agents

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Maraviroc is a chemokine receptor antagonist drug developed by the drug company Pfizer that is designed to act against HIV by interfering with the interaction between HIV and CCR5

incompatibilities.description: The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Ritonavir
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Boceprevir
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Voriconazole
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Naloxone
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Ditiocarb
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Stiripentol
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Danoprevir

The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Loperamide
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Conivaptan
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Telithromycin
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Ketoconazole
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be decreased when combined with Atazanavir

The serum concentration of Maraviroc can be decreased when it is combined with Efavirenz
The serum concentration of Maraviroc can be decreased when it is combined with Pitolisant
The metabolism of Maraviroc can be increased when combined with Metreleptin
The therapeutic efficacy of Rubella virus vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette guerin substrain tice live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette guerin substrain connaught live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Yellow Fever Vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Anthrax vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid Vaccine Live can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette guerin substrain danish 1331 live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Human adenovirus e serotype 4 strain cl 68578 antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Vibrio cholerae CVD 103 HgR strain live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Adenovirus type 7 vaccine live can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
The therapeutic efficacy of Varicella Zoster Vaccine Live attenuated can be decreased when used in combination with Maraviroc
Maraviroc may increase the hepatotoxic activities of Pexidartinib
The serum concentration of Maraviroc can be decreased when it is combined with Cenobamate
The serum concentration of Maraviroc can be increased when it is combined with Darunavir
